# Generated by the Vitis IDE. Do not modify.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)
project(async-static
LANGUAGES
C CXX
)

# Including the cmake modules from the Vitis Install.
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
"$ENV{XILINX_VITIS}/vitisng-server/scripts/cmake"
${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}
)
find_package(Vitis REQUIRED)

# Default Target is sw_emu, can be overridden by passing cmake argument. Valid
# values are sw_emu,hw_emu or hw Example: -DVITIS_TARGET=hw_emu  builds the
# project for target hw_emu
set(VITIS_TARGET
sw_emu
CACHE STRING
"Target for which the project should be built"
)
set_property(CACHE VITIS_TARGET
   PROPERTY
    STRINGS sw_emu hw_emu hw
)

set(VITIS_PLATFORM_PATH
/tools/Xilinx/Vitis/2024.1/base_platforms/xilinx_zcu102_base_202410_1/xilinx_zcu102_base_202410_1.xpfm
CACHE STRING
"Vitis Platform"
)

add_subdirectory(hw_link)
add_subdirectory(package)
